thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: No frills, but comfortable
thread.title_full: No frills, but comfortable - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Patriciafrom95020
title: No frills, but comfortable
text: At $150/ night (divided by the 2 of us), this worked just fine. Beds were comfortable and clean, noise was less than expected for a big city, and bathroom was small, but efficient. Staff was pleasant but didn't gush. 2 blocks from the E train and just a few more to Times Square, the Wellington met our needs. Attached restaurant always seemed full, and we had breakfast there one morning, spending three times as much as breakfast at Toste's. But the atmosphere was indeed nicer.
